description: A walk beginning at Broadmead Shopping Centre taking you to the Royal Oak Burial Park. An incline to the top then going through Grant Park and Kentwood Park to end up looping back to Broadmead Shopping Centre
directions: Leave town on Blanshard Street. After it becomes Pat Bay Hwy (#17), take the Royal Oak exit turning right on Royal Oak Drive. At a hundred meters, turn right again at the traffic lights into the shopping centre parking lot. Park close to Royal Oak Drive.
title: Broadmead
